name: Archaic Mechanics
description:
"Archaic mechanics
rusting in the train
of thought
that the world lost
to the blue eye
on the screen."

interference// is the a/v project of Beatrice Schleyer and Sky Goodman

12 second loop

original footage processed with the Panasonic MX50 and Edirol V4. Rescanned off a CRT monitor.
